level.heading: CONSUMER PRODUCTS – PRODUCTS REQUIRING DILUTION (ยง 20-723)

level.text: Consumer products wherein the label, packaging, or accompanying literature specifically states that the product should be diluted with water or non-VOC solvent before use shall comply with the following:
Limits specified in the Table of Standards in ยง 720.1 shall apply to the product only after the minimum recommended dilution has taken place; and
Minimum recommended dilution shall not include recommendations for incidental use of a concentrated product to deal with limited special applications such as hardtoremove soils or stains.

Consumer products wherein the label, packaging, or accompanying literature states that the product should be diluted with any VOC solvent prior to use, shall comply with the limits specified in the Table of Standards in ยง 720.1, only after the maximum recommended dilution has taken place.
